questions.You need to deploy multiple EC2 instance: Check the AWS marketplace for an official OpenVPN AMI or select a regular Linux AMI and bootstrap it yourself with an OpenVPN insallation and configuration.

questions.You want to migrate VMWare VMs to EC2; W: Import the VM using VM Import/Export and select the imported VM from AWS Marketplace AMIs and launch the instance.

questions.AWS CLI to launch EC2 fails with the err: You are probably in the wrong region. AMIs are specific to a region

questions.What tenancy provides complete physical: Only Dedicated Host offers complete isolation

questions.Normally your instances can handle traff: Reserve instances is cheaper in general but for sporradic workloads that only occur occasionally would be cheaper as on-demand, knowing it will scale down completely when not in use

questions.What's a cost effective use case for spo: Spot instances can be shut down with short (2 minute) warning, and aren't for reliably predictable applications

questions.What CANNOT be changed about an EC2 inst: AMI cannot be changed, but type, security group, and IP can all be changed. Type requires a restart.

questions.What EBS option would be best for an app: Provision-IOPS SSD are the only thing that gets close, at 64k

questions.Your org needs to produce a new 'Golden: Create a snapshot of the EBS root volume, create an image from that, select your new AMI from your private collection. Then make an image of the EBS volume attached to the instance, select it and use it for your launch configuration. Finally, import the EBS snapshot into another AWS account to create an image. Use that new AMI for your launch config.

questions.What are 2 benefits of instance store vo: Physically attached and thus faster. Also cheaper, incur no additional cost other than the instance itself

questions.Using AWS recommendations, suggest 2 pri: 172.17.23.43 and 10.0.32.176 ... 192 kinda works but 10 has the widest range

questions.What 3 data attributes can be considered: Ports, source, and destination are all available, not size
